words.definition: If something is apparent, it is easy to see.
words.example: It was apparent that the girl was sad.

words.definition: When people are blind, they cannot see.
words.example: The blind man used a stick to walk.

words.definition: To calculate is to find an answer using math.
words.example: I had to calculate the cost of the trip.

words.definition: To chat is to talk with someone.
words.example: We chatted about our weekend plans.

words.definition: To commit is to do something bad or a crime.
words.example: He committed a crime and was sent to jail.

words.definition: To compose is to make something.
words.example: He composed a beautiful song.

words.definition: A dormitory is a school building where students live.
words.example: I live in a dormitory with many other students.

words.definition: To exhaust someone is to make them very tired.
words.example: The long walk exhausted the children.

words.definition: A greenhouse is a building used to grow plants.
words.example: We grew tomatoes in the greenhouse.

words.definition: To ignore someone or something is to not look at or listen to them.
words.example: I ignored the phone when it rang.

words.definition: If something is obvious, it is easy to see or understand.
words.example: It was obvious that he was lying.

words.definition: Physics is a kind of science that studies energy and matter.
words.example: I learned about gravity in physics class.

words.definition: A portion is a part of something.
words.example: I only ate a portion of the cake.

words.definition: To remind is to make someone think of something again.
words.example: She reminded me of our meeting.

words.definition: A secretary is a person who works in an office.
words.example: The secretary answered the phone.

words.definition: When something is severe, it is very bad.
words.example: He had a severe headache.

words.definition: A talent is something that you are good at.
words.example: She has a talent for singing.

words.definition: A thesis is a long paper for school.
words.example: He wrote his thesis on history.

words.definition: A uniform is a special kind of clothing for school or work.
words.example: I wear a uniform to school.

words.definition: Vision is the act of seeing.
words.example: He has good vision.
